00025 V172X_ChannelParams::V172X_ChannelParams() : 
00026   ParameterList("V172X_ChannelParams", 
00027                 "Information about a single channel in a CAEN V172X digitizer")
00028 {
00029   RegisterParameter("enabled", enabled=true, 
00030                     "Is this channel active in the current run?");
00031   RegisterParameter("enable_trigger_source", enable_trigger_source=false,
00032                     "Does this channel generat local trigger signals?");
00033   RegisterParameter("enable_trigger_out", enable_trigger_out=false,
00034                     "Does this channel generate trigger out signals?");
00035   RegisterParameter("threshold", threshold = halfmax14,
00036                     "The threshold (in counts) for the signal to trigger on");
00037   RegisterParameter("thresh_time_us", thresh_time_us = 0,
00038                     "Time that the signal must be above/below threshold in order to generate a trigger");
00039   RegisterParameter("dc_offset", dc_offset = halfmax16,
00040                     "DC offset (16 bit range) applied to the signal before digitizing");
00041   RegisterParameter("zs_polarity", zs_polarity = TP_FALLING, "Do we suppress the signal if it is below or above the zs_threshold?");
00042   RegisterParameter("zs_threshold",zs_threshold = halfmax14, "Threshold the signal must cross before it is considered to be non-zero");
00043   RegisterParameter("zs_thresh_time_us",zs_thresh_time_us = 0,"Time a signal must be above the zs_threshold before it counts");
00044   RegisterParameter("zs_pre_samps", zs_pre_samps = 10, 
00045                     "Number of samples to save before a ZLE removed block");
00046   RegisterParameter("zs_post_samps", zs_post_samps = 10, 
00047                     "Number of samples to save after a ZLE removed block");
00048   
00049   RegisterParameter("label",label="x", 
00050                     "A descriptive label for the channel");
00051 }

00053 V172X_BoardParams::V172X_BoardParams() : 
00054   ParameterList("V172X_BoardParams",
00055                 "Information about a single CAEN V172X Digitizer")
00056 {
00057   RegisterParameter("enabled", enabled = false,
00058                     "Is this board active in this run?");
00059   RegisterParameter("address", address = 0xFFFF0000,
00060                     "Address of the board on the VME crate (set in hardware)");
00061   RegisterParameter("link", link = 0,
00062                     "Board optical link number");
00063   RegisterParameter("id", id = -1, "Software id of the board");
00064   RegisterParameter("board_type", board_type = OTHER,
00065                     "Specific model of digitizer (V1720, V1724, V1721)");
00066   RegisterParameter("v_full_scale", v_full_scale = 2,
00067                     "Full scale range in voltage of the digitizer input");
00068   RegisterParameter("stupid_size_factor", stupid_size_factor = 1);
00069   RegisterParameter("sample_bits", sample_bits = 12,
00070                     "Sampling depth of the ADC conversion");
00071   RegisterParameter("max_sample_rate", max_sample_rate = 250.,
00072                     "Maximum number of samples recorded per microsecond");
00073   RegisterParameter("mem_size", mem_size = 1,
00074                     "Maximum size of onboard buffer, in MSamples/channel");
00075   RegisterParameter("bytes_per_sample", bytes_per_sample = 2,
00076                     "Number of aligned bytes needed for a single sample");
00077   RegisterParameter("event_size_bytes", event_size_bytes = 0,
00078                     "Expected size of a single event in bytes");
00079   RegisterParameter("ns_per_clocktick", ns_per_clocktick = 8,
00080                     "Time between each tick of the onboard trigger clock");
00081   RegisterParameter("enable_software_trigger", enable_software_trigger=true,
00082                     "Can this board receive triggers from the VME plane (from the computer)?");
00083   RegisterParameter("enable_software_trigger_out",
00084                     enable_software_trigger_out = true,
00085                     "Does this board repeat VME triggers to the trigger-out signal?");
00086   RegisterParameter("enable_external_trigger", enable_external_trigger=true,
00087                     "Does this board trigger on the trigger-in signal?");
00088   RegisterParameter("enable_external_trigger_out",
00089                     enable_external_trigger_out = true,
00090                     "Does this board repeat the trigger-in to trigger-out?");
00091   RegisterParameter("local_trigger_coincidence",local_trigger_coincidence = 0,
00092                     "Number of channels after the first necessary to generate a trigger");
00093   RegisterParameter("pre_trigger_time_us", pre_trigger_time_us = 1,
00094                     "Length of buffer time to to store before the trigger");
00095   RegisterParameter("post_trigger_time_us", post_trigger_time_us = 30,
00096                     "Length of time after the trigger to store");
00097   RegisterParameter("downsample_factor", downsample_factor = 1,
00098                     "No longer implemented in CAEN firmware; kept for compatibility only!");
00099   RegisterParameter("trigger_polarity", trigger_polarity = TP_FALLING,
00100                     "Determines whether to generate trigger when the signal is above or below the trigger threshold");
00101   RegisterParameter("count_all_triggers", count_all_triggers = true,
00102                     "Do we increment the trigger counter when overlapping triggers come in, or the buffer is full?");
00103   RegisterParameter("zs_type", zs_type = NONE,
00104                     "Which type of zero suppression to use (should be NONE)");
00105   RegisterParameter("enable_trigger_overlap", enable_trigger_overlap = false,
00106                     "Do we generate partial triggers if two come in too close to each other?");
00107   RegisterParameter("signal_logic", signal_logic = NIM,
00108                     "Type of logic (NIM or TTL) for external signals");
00109   RegisterParameter("enable_test_pattern", enable_test_pattern = false,
00110                     "Generate a triangle wave on the channels instead of measure real signals?");
00111   //RegisterParameter("acq_control_val", 
00112   //acq_control_val =  ( 1<<4 * (downsample_factor > 1) + 
00113   //1<<3 * count_all_triggers ) ); 
00114   for(int i=0; i<nchans; i++){
00115     char key[20];
00116     sprintf(key,"channel%d",i);
00117     RegisterParameter(key,channel[i]);
00118   }  
00119 }

00121 V172X_Params::V172X_Params() : ParameterList("V172X_Params")
00122 {
00123   RegisterParameter("align64", align64 = true,
00124                     "Do we include an extra empty sample when using 64-bit size words?");
00125   RegisterParameter("trigger_timeout_ms", trigger_timeout_ms = 3000,
00126                     "Time to wait for a trigger before timing out");
00127   RegisterParameter("max_mem_size", max_mem_size  = 209715200,
00128                     "Maximum amount of memory we're allowed to use for the raw event buffer");
00129   RegisterParameter("no_low_mem_warn",no_low_mem_warn = false,
00130                     "Should we suppress the warning generated when the raw event buffer is full?");
00131   RegisterParameter("send_start_pulse",send_start_pulse = false,
00132                     "Do we tell the digitizers to wait to start the event until a synchornize pulse is sent (true), or start immediately (false)");
00133   RegisterParameter("auto_trigger", auto_trigger = false,
00134                     "Do we automatically generate a trigger if timeout occurrs?");
00135   RegisterParameter("vme_bridge_link", vme_bridge_link = 0,
00136                     "VME bridge optical link number");
00137   //RegisterParameter("event_size_bytes", event_size_bytes = 0);
00138   //RegisterParameter("enabled_boards", enabled_boards = 0);
00139   //RegisterParameter("enabled_channels", enabled_channels = 0);
00140   for(int i=0; i<nboards; i++){
00141     char key[20];
00142     sprintf(key,"board%d",i);
00143     RegisterParameter(key,board[i]);
00144     board[i].id = i;
00145     for(int j=0; j<board[i].nchans; j++){
00146       sprintf(key,"b%dch%d",i,j);
00147       board[i].channel[j].label = key;
00148     }
00149   }
00150 }

00152 int V172X_BoardParams::UpdateBoardSpecificVariables()
00153 {
00154   switch(board_type){
00155   case V1724:
00156     max_sample_rate = 100.;
00157     sample_bits = 14;
00158     bytes_per_sample = 2;
00159     v_full_scale = 2.25;
00160     stupid_size_factor = 1;
00161     ns_per_clocktick = 10;
00162     break;
00163   case V1720:
00164     max_sample_rate = 250;
00165     sample_bits = 12;
00166     bytes_per_sample = 2;
00167     v_full_scale = 2;
00168     stupid_size_factor = 2;
00169     ns_per_clocktick = 8;
00170     break;
00171   case V1721:
00172      max_sample_rate = 1000;
00173     sample_bits = 8;
00174     bytes_per_sample = 1;
00175     v_full_scale = 2;
00176     stupid_size_factor = 1;
00177     ns_per_clocktick = 8;
00178     break;
00179   case V1751:
00180     max_sample_rate = 1000;
00181     sample_bits = 10;
00182     bytes_per_sample = 2;
00183     v_full_scale = 1;
00184     stupid_size_factor = 7;
00185     ns_per_clocktick = 4;
00186     break;
00187   default:
00188     return -1;
00189     
00190   }
00191   return 0;
00192 }

00195 //returns sample rate in samples per microsecond
00196 double V172X_BoardParams::GetSampleRate() const
00197 {
00198   //if(downsample_factor > 10) downsample_factor = 10;
00199   return max_sample_rate;
00200 }
00201 
00202 uint32_t V172X_BoardParams::GetPostNSamps() const
00203 {
00204   return (uint32_t)(post_trigger_time_us * GetSampleRate());
00205 }
00206 
00207 uint32_t V172X_BoardParams::GetPreNSamps() const
00208 {
00209   return (uint32_t)(pre_trigger_time_us * GetSampleRate());
00210 }
00211 
00212 uint32_t V172X_BoardParams::GetTotalNSamps() const
00213 {
00214   uint32_t total_nsamps = (uint32_t)
00215     (( pre_trigger_time_us + post_trigger_time_us ) * GetSampleRate());
00216   while( total_nsamps % (4/bytes_per_sample)) total_nsamps++;
00217   //if(total_nsamps%2) total_nsamps++;
00218   return total_nsamps;
00219 }
00220 
00221 uint32_t V172X_BoardParams::GetBufferCode() const
00222 {
00223   int max_samples = mem_size*Mbyte / bytes_per_sample;
00224   if(board_type == V1751)
00225     max_samples = (int)(Mbyte * (mem_size == 0x02 ? 1.835 : 14.4 ));
00226   uint32_t buffer_code = (uint32_t)floor(log2(max_samples / GetTotalNSamps()));
00227   if(buffer_code > 0xA)
00228     buffer_code = 0xA;
00229   return buffer_code;
00230 }
00231 
00232 uint32_t V172X_BoardParams::GetCustomSizeSetting() const
00233 {
00234   if(board_type == V1751)
00235     return GetTotalNSamps()/stupid_size_factor;
00236   return GetTotalNSamps()*bytes_per_sample/
00237     ( sizeof(uint32_t) * stupid_size_factor);
00238 }
00239 
00240 uint32_t V172X_BoardParams::GetPostTriggerSetting() const
00241 {
00242   const int latency = 10;
00243   if(board_type == V1751)
00244     return GetPostNSamps() / 16 - latency;
00245   return GetPostNSamps()/(2*stupid_size_factor) - latency;
00246   
00247 }
00248 
00249 //return the index corresponding to the sample at the trigger time
00250 int V172X_BoardParams::GetTriggerIndex() const
00251 {
00252   return GetPreNSamps();
00253 }
00254 
00255 uint64_t V172X_BoardParams::GetTimestampRange() const
00256 {
00257   return 0x7fffffff * ns_per_clocktick;
00258 }

00260 int V172X_Params::GetEnabledBoards()
00261 {
00262   enabled_boards = 0;                          
00263   for(int i=0; i<nboards; i++)
00264     if(board[i].enabled) enabled_boards++;
00265   return enabled_boards;
00266 }
00267 
00268 int V172X_Params::GetEnabledChannels()
00269 {
00270   enabled_boards = 0;
00271   enabled_channels = 0;
00272   for(int i=0; i<nboards; i++){
00273     if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00274     enabled_boards++;
00275     for(int j=0; j<board[i].nchans; j++){
00276       if(board[i].channel[j].enabled) enabled_channels++;
00277     }
00278   }
00279   return enabled_channels;
00280 }
00281 
00282 //Get the max expected event size in bytes
00283 int V172X_Params::GetEventSize()
00284 {
00285   enabled_boards = 0;
00286   enabled_channels = 0;
00287   event_size_bytes = 0;
00288   //event_size_bytes = event_size_padding;
00289   for(int i=0; i<nboards; i++){
00290     if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00291     enabled_boards++;
00292     board[i].event_size_bytes = event_size_padding + 16; //padding + header
00293     for(int j =0; j<board[i].nchans; j++){
00294       if(board[i].channel[j].enabled){
00295         enabled_channels++;
00296         board[i].event_size_bytes += ( board[i].GetTotalNSamps() * 
00297                                        board[i].bytes_per_sample )
00298           + (board[i].zs_type == ZLE ? 8 : 0 );
00299       }
00300     }//end for loop over channels
00301     event_size_bytes += board[i].event_size_bytes;
00302   }//end for loop over boards
00303   
00304   return event_size_bytes;
00305 }

00307 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, SIGNAL_LOGIC logic)
00308 {
00309   if(logic==NIM) 
00310     return out<<"NIM";
00311   else
00312     return out<<"TTL";
00313 }
00314 
00315 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, ZERO_SUPPRESSION_TYPE zs)
00316 {
00317   if(zs == NONE) 
00318     return out<<"NONE";
00319   else if(zs == ZS_INT)
00320     return out<<"ZS_INT";
00321   else if(zs == ZLE)
00322     return out<<"ZLE";
00323   else
00324     return out<<"ZS_AMP";
00325 }
00326 
00327 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, TRIGGER_POLARITY pol)
00328 {
00329   if(pol == TP_RISING)
00330     return out<<"TP_RISING";
00331   else 
00332     return out<<"TP_FALLING";
00333 }
00334 
00335 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, BOARD_TYPE type)
00336 {
00337   if(type == V1724)
00338     return out<<"V1724";
00339   else if (type == V1720)
00340     return out<<"V1720";
00341   else if (type == V1721)
00342     return out<<"V1721";
00343   else if (type == V1751)
00344     return out<<"V1751";
00345   else 
00346     return out<<"OTHER";
00347 }
00348 
00349 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, SIGNAL_LOGIC &logic)
00350 {
00351   std::string temp;
00352   in>>temp;
00353   if(temp == "NIM" || temp == "nim")
00354     logic = NIM;
00355   else if(temp == "TTL" || temp == "ttl")
00356     logic = TTL;
00357   else{
00358     Message e(EXCEPTION);
00359     e<<temp<<" is not a valid value for SIGNAL_LOGIC"<<std::endl;
00360     throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00361   }
00362   return in;
00363 }
00364   
00365 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, ZERO_SUPPRESSION_TYPE &zs)
00366 {
00367   std::string temp;
00368   in>>temp;
00369   if(temp == "NONE" || temp == "none")
00370     zs = NONE;
00371   else if(temp == "ZS_INT" || temp == "zs_int")
00372     zs = ZS_INT;
00373   else if(temp == "ZLE" || temp == "zle")
00374     zs = ZLE;
00375   else if(temp == "ZS_AMP" || temp == "zs_amp")
00376     zs = ZS_AMP;
00377   else{
00378     Message e(EXCEPTION);
00379     e<<temp<<" is not a valid value for ZERO_SUPPRESSION_TYPE"<<std::endl;
00380     throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00381   }
00382   return in;
00383 }
00384 
00385 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, TRIGGER_POLARITY &pol)
00386 {
00387   std::string temp;
00388   in>>temp;
00389   if(temp == "TP_RISING" || temp == "tp_rising")
00390     pol = TP_RISING;
00391   else if(temp == "TP_FALLING" || temp == "tp_falling")
00392     pol = TP_FALLING;
00393   else{
00394     Message e(EXCEPTION);
00395     e<<temp<<" is not a valid value for TRIGGER_POLARITY"<<std::endl;
00396     throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00397   }
00398   return in;
00399 }

00401 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, BOARD_TYPE& type)
00402 {
00403   std::string temp;
00404   in>>temp;
00405   if(temp == "V1724")
00406      type = V1724;
00407   else if(temp == "V1720")
00408     type = V1720;
00409   else if (temp == "V1721")
00410     type = V1721;
00411   else if (temp == "V1751")
00412     type = V1751;
00413   else if (temp == "OTHER")
00414     type = OTHER;
00415   else{
00416     type = OTHER;
00417     Message e(EXCEPTION);
00418     e<<temp<<" is not a valid value for BOARD_TYPE"<<std::endl;
00419     throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00420   }
00421   return in;
00422 }
